Name: Super Chains
About the game: Explore a stunning variety of puzzles involving action, strategy and flow. Enjoy the physics-driven gameplay under the soothing soundtrack of L'autre Endroit by Silence. Whether you like a good challenge or prefer an endless, zen-inducing experience then Super Chains has you covered! Challenge your friends' scores and try your hand at achievements mastery. Think you are skilled enough to tackle the leaderboards? It's not going to be easy since each puzzle gets progressively harder the longer you play. Support one of the first indie puzzle games on Steam, enjoyed by hundreds of thousands of players for over a decade. 2dengine presents the sequel and long awaited follow-up to the original puzzle game Chains .
